# SEICAT

- URL:
  - https://discovery.ucl.ac.uk/1559835/1/Blackburn_SEICAT%20R2%20MEE%20final.pdf
- Accessed: 2026-02-08

## NBMS mapping
- `SEICATAssessment.category` uses SEICAT categories:
  - `MC`, `MN`, `MO`, `MR`, `MV`, `DD`, `NE`.
- NBMS stores:
  - wellbeing constituents (JSON),
  - activity-change narrative,
  - confidence/uncertainty,
  - assessor/reviewer workflow metadata.
